questions.question: Which office skills concepts would be nice for me to adopt before starting my first engineering job?
questions.answer:
If you are looking to adopt office skills concepts before starting your first engineering job, you may want to focus on improving your communicative competencies. Enhancing your communication skills can be beneficial in various aspects of your professional life, including collaborating with colleagues, presenting ideas effectively, and building strong relationships with clients or stakeholders.

To learn more about how to showcase your communicative competencies in your resume, you can refer to the following article: https://cvapp.de/blog/kommunikative-faehigkeiten

Would you like to explore more resources on improving your communication skills for your upcoming engineering job?
